question:
Which among the following newspapers stopped publishing after the introduction of the Newspapers (Incitement to Offences) Act of 1908?
1. Yugantar
2. Sandhya
3. Bandematram
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: In the year (June), the Newspapers (Incitement to Offences) Act was passed. After the introduction of the act Sandhya (Brahmabandhab Upadhyay), Yugantar, Bandematram stopped publishing.
